entries.content:
Session started with Moti - refreshed context on Sementix project. Recent work includes:
- UI action-specific formatter migration (clean orchestrator pattern)
- Tool result payload refactoring (nested action-specific structure)
- Permission system fixes for streaming mode
- Header UI refinements with dropdown and new-chat button
- Input auto-refocus for better UX

Currently checking git status to see what's in progress...

Fixed build errors after Moti removed logger methods from ChunkDebugLogger:
- Removed calls to deleted methods: logYieldingChunk, logChunkingStart, logCodeBlocks, logNoCodeBlocks, logChunkingComplete, logPlainTextBeforeBlock, logAtomicCodeBlock, logRemainingText, logRawChunk, logBufferSplit
- Fixed unused variable linting errors (removed unused 'i' parameter, changed to 'index' where needed)
- Removed ChunkDebugLogger from constructor parameters in TextChunker and StreamingNDJSONProcessorOrchestrator
- Removed unused imports
- Build passed successfully âœ“
